parameter.name: sendCorrelationStrategy
parameter.description: Whether to specify a correlationId when publishing messages. This applies both for custom correlation ids specified at the operation level and for default correlation Ids taken from the current event.

parameter.name: zoneId
parameter.description: The Zone Id property is used to identify the rules used to convert between an Instant and LocalDateTime. If the Zone Id equals 'Z', UTC will be used. If the Zone Id is not specified, the System default Zone Id will be used.

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: The identifier of this element used to reference it in other components

parameter.name: expirationPolicy
parameter.description: Configures the minimum amount of time that a dynamic configuration instance can remain idle before the runtime considers it eligible for expiration. This does not mean that the platform will expire the instance at the exact moment that it becomes eligible. The runtime will actually purge the instances when it sees it fit.

connection.name: sas-connection
connection.description: Uses the SAS Key Name and the SAS Key to generate a token, which is used by the Azure Service Bus SDK to establish the connection to the Service Bus instance

parameter.name: namespace
parameter.description: The namespace contains the resources to which the connector will be able to establish a connection

parameter.name: sharedAccessKeyName
parameter.description: The name of the Shared Access key

parameter.name: sharedAccessKey
parameter.description: The Shared Access key

parameter.name: responseTimeout
parameter.description: The amount of time to wait for the operation to execute before throwing an error. This value is qualified by the #responseTimeoutTimeUnit

parameter.name: responseTimeoutTimeUnit
parameter.description: A time unit which qualifies the #responseTimeout value

parameter.name: minimumRetryBackoff
parameter.description: The minimum amount of time that the connector will wait until retrying again

parameter.name: minimumRetryBackoffTimeUnit
parameter.description: A time unit which qualifies the #minimumRetryBackoff value

parameter.name: maximumRetryBackoff
parameter.description: The maximum amount of time that the connector will wait until retrying again

parameter.name: maximumRetryBackoffTimeUnit
parameter.description: A time unit which qualifies the #maximumRetryBackoff value

parameter.name: retries
parameter.description: The maximum amount of retries that the connector will attempt

parameter.name: reconnection
parameter.description: When the application is deployed, a connectivity test is performed on all connectors. If set to true, deployment will fail if the test doesn't pass after exhausting the associated reconnection strategy

extension.name: Azure Service Bus Messaging Connector
extension.description: The Azure Service Bus Messaging Connector

operation.name: abandonMessage
operation.description: Abandon message stored in the current receiver (This is equivalent to a NACK operation). This operation can only be used from inside a flow that has a Message Listener Source.

parameter.name: lockToken
parameter.description: The Lock Token from the message to Abandon. This represents a UUID for a message.

parameter.name: config-ref
parameter.description: The name of the configuration to be used to execute this component

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: completeMessage
operation.description: Complete a message received from in a flow with a message listener in the current source (this is the same as an acknowledge)

parameter.name: lockToken
parameter.description: The Lock Token from the message to ACK. This represents a UUID for a message.

parameter.name: config-ref
parameter.description: The name of the configuration to be used to execute this component

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: receive
operation.description: This operation receives a message from a specific queue or subscription. In this version it only supports the Immediate Receive Mode (RECEIVEANDDELETE).

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The encoding of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: config-ref
parameter.description: The name of the configuration to be used to execute this component

parameter.name: destinationName
parameter.description: "The name of the destination from which messages will be received"

parameter.name: subscriptionName
parameter.description: The name of the subscription from which messages will be received

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: receiveBatch
operation.description: This operation receives a maximum of maxMessageCount messages from a specific queue or subscription. In this version it only supports the Immediate Receive Mode (RECEIVEANDDELETE).

parameter.name: maxMessageCount
parameter.description: The maximum number of messages that will be received

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The encoding of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: config-ref
parameter.description: The name of the configuration to be used to execute this component

parameter.name: destinationName
parameter.description: "The name of the destination from which messages will be received"

parameter.name: subscriptionName
parameter.description: The name of the subscription from which messages will be received

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: send
operation.description: Sends a message to a Queue or Topic

parameter.name: destinationName
parameter.description: The destination name to which the message will be sent.

parameter.name: body
parameter.description: The body of this message

parameter.name: config-ref
parameter.description: The name of the configuration to be used to execute this component

parameter.name: messageId
parameter.description: The message identifier is an application-defined value that uniquely identifies the message and its payload

parameter.name: correlationId
parameter.description: Allows an application to specify a context for the message for the purposes of correlation

parameter.name: sessionId
parameter.description: The session identifier for a session-aware entity

parameter.name: replyTo
parameter.description: The name of the destination to which the message reply will be sent

parameter.name: replyToSessionId
parameter.description: The ID of the Session to be tied with the message

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: Enables the application to indicate the purpose of the message to the receiver

parameter.name: timeToLiveTimeUnit
parameter.description: The Time unit for the Write Concern Timeout

parameter.name: properties
parameter.description: Map of user application properties set on the message

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: sendMessageBatch
operation.description: Sends a list of messages to a Queue/Topic

parameter.name: destinationName
parameter.description: The destination name to which the message will be sent

parameter.name: messages
parameter.description: The messages to be sent

parameter.name: config-ref
parameter.description: The name of the configuration to be used to execute this component

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

source.name: message-listener
source.description: Receive messages from a specific queue or subscription.

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The encoding of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: config-ref
parameter.description: The name of the configuration to be used to execute this component

parameter.name: primaryNodeOnly
parameter.description: Whether this source should only be executed on the primary node when runnning in Cluster

parameter.name: redeliveryPolicy
parameter.description: Defines a policy for processing the redelivery of the same message

parameter.name: destinationName
parameter.description: "The name of the destination from which messages will be received"

parameter.name: subscriptionName
parameter.description: The name of the subscription from which messages will be received

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors
